entry.title: Path traversal vulnerability exists in RICOH Streamline NX V3 PC Client versions 350 to 32420
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-925q-2ff6-6j9x

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-46783

  • https://jvn.jp/en/jp/JVN27937557

  • https://www.ricoh.com/products/security/vulnerabilities/vul?id=ricoh-2025-000005

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-925q-2ff6-6j9x

描述：

Path traversal vulnerability exists in RICOH Streamline NX V3 PC Client versions 3.5.0 to 3.242.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary code may be executed on the PC where the product is running by tampering with specific files used on the product.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-925q-2ff6-6j9x

entry.title: Roundcube Webmail 命令注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 命令注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-12641

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail 1.4.4之前的版本中存在命令注入漏洞，攻击者可以通过控制配置设置中的im_convert_path或im_identify_path中的shell元字符来执行任意代码，可能导致系统完全被攻陷。

产品厂商： roundcube

产品名称： webmail

影响版本： version < 1.4.4

搜索语法： http.component:”roundcube”

entry.title: Roundcube Webmail 命令注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 命令注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-12641

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail 1.4.4之前的版本中存在命令注入漏洞，由于im_convert_path或im_identify_path配置设置中的shell元字符导致，攻击者可以执行任意代码，利用此漏洞需要攻击者控制配置设置。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version < 1.4.4

搜索语法： http.component:”roundcube”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12153

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4 contains a command injection caused by shell metacharacters in configuration settings for im_convert_path or im_identify_path, letting attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires attacker to control configuration settings.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/DrunkenShells/Disclosures/tree/master/CVE-2020-12641-Command%20Injection-Roundcube
  • https://github.com/mbadanoiu/MAL-004
  • https://github.com/mbadanoiu/CVE-2020-12641

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.component:"roundcube"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 命令注入漏洞

entry.title: WordPress Traffic Monitor Plugin 未授权漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： WordPress Traffic Monitor Plugin 未授权漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-5815

漏洞类型： 未授权访问

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-5815是WordPress Traffic Monitor插件中的一个未授权漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过暴露的AJAX动作无需认证即可禁用机器人日志记录。此漏洞源于对tfcm_set_bot_flags AJAX动作缺少认证和授权检查，导致攻击者可篡改插件设置，禁用机器人日志记录，从而逃避受影响WordPress网站上的活动监控。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： Traffic Monitor Plugin

影响版本： <= 3.2.2

来源： https://github.com/RootHarpy/CVE-2025-5815-Nuclei-Template

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-5815.yaml
  • README.md

来源概述

📄 Nuclei Template for CVE-2025-5815

🚀 Overview

This repository features a Nuclei template specifically designed to detect an Unauthenticated Bot Logging Disable Vulnerability (CVE-2025-5815) in the Traffic Monitor WordPress plugin. This issue allows unauthenticated attackers to remotely disable bot logging via a vulnerable AJAX action.

🔍 Vulnerability Description

CVE-2025-5815 arises from missing authentication and authorization checks on the tfcm_set_bot_flags AJAX action in the Traffic Monitor plugin for WordPress. This allows remote attackers to tamper with plugin settings, disabling bot logging without requiring login credentials — leading to evasion of activity monitoring on affected WordPress sites.

🛑 Affected Versions

  • Traffic Monitor Plugin: Versions up to and including 3.2.2

📊 CVSS Score

  • Base Score: 5.3 (Medium)

🏷️ CVSS Vector

  • CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N

📋 Template Details

This Nuclei template attempts to exploit the vulnerable AJAX endpoint by sending an unauthenticated request to admin-ajax.php with the action=tfcm_set_bot_flags parameter and checks for a success confirmation in the response body.

🛠️ Usage Instructions

To use this template with Nuclei, make sure Nuclei is installed on your system. Then run the following command:

Replace path/to/CVE-2025-5815.yaml with the actual path to your template file and <target_url> with the target website URL.

👤 Author

This template was developed by RootHarpy. For inquiries, collaboration, or contributions, feel free to connect via GitHub.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： WordPress Traffic Monitor Plugin 未授权漏洞<

entry.title: OpenNMS Horizon 认证远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： OpenNMS Horizon 认证远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： OpenNMS Horizon存在一个认证远程代码执行漏洞，允许攻击者在认证后通过特定的HTTP请求执行任意命令。此漏洞的利用需要有效的用户凭证。

产品厂商： OpenNMS

产品名称： OpenNMS Horizon

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20306

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

Steps to reproduce

How’d you do it?

  1. Use linux/http/opennms_horizon_authenticated_rce
  2. Show payloads returns no results.
  3. Trying to run the exploit with the exploit’s default configured payload (cmd/linux/http/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp) returns an incompatible payload error.

Metasploit version

Framework: 6.4.64-dev
Console : 6.4.64-dev

Additional Information

entry.title: The REST API Custom API Generator For Cross Platform And Import Export In WP plugin for
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqr5-32x6-7hw9

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-5288

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/import-export-with-custom-rest-api/tags/2.0.3/backend/methods/wot-rapi-import-functions.php#L123

  • https://wordpress.org/plugins/import-export-with-custom-rest-api/#developers

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/0e2774fc-f028-436c-a8af-3c17378b9743?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqr5-32x6-7hw9

描述：

The REST API | Custom API Generator For Cross Platform And Import Export In WP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Privilege Escalation due to a missing capability check on the process_handler() function in versions 1.0.0 to 2.0.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to POST an arbitrary import_api URL, import specially crafted JSON, and thereby create a new user with full Administrator privileges.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqr5-32x6-7hw9

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 允许未经身份验证的攻击者利用该漏洞实现任意文件读取，大多数据处理中间件或流式处理框架，如：Apache Spark Structured Streaming、Apache Druid等在应用中需要调用Kafka Connect组件，而这些服务会存储大量的核心业务系统敏感数据，一旦被攻击将造成更加严重的数据泄密。

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install功能存在缓冲区溢出漏洞，由于对Smart Install数据包的不当验证，未经身份验证的远程攻击者可通过发送特制的Smart Install消息（TCP端口4786）触发设备重新加载、执行任意代码或导致无限循环。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12325

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software contain a buffer overflow caused by improper validation of Smart Install packet data, letting unauthenticated remote attackers trigger device reload, execute arbitrary code, or cause indefinite loops, exploit requires sending crafted Smart Install message on TCP port 4786.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6d4b443f23fc
  • https://github.com/AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit
  • https///github.com:AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow
